name: Above the Sky (AmpersandEntertainment)
description:
Above the Sky is a 2D platforms game about a young man who has to deliver drugs to the clients, sometimes after consuming them, and having to deal with their effects.

In Above the Sky, the player will control Jason, a young man who recently loses his mother. He tries to make everything to survive and gets involved with a drug dealer. His job is to make deliveries in New York City to the clients. The problem gets bigger once he starts to try the drugs too, so he will be affected by them, making the game so confusing: changing environments, different controls, speed... making the game so much challenging for the player.

GAME ONLY IN SPANISH!

Controls:

Movement (and dialogue navigation): Left and Right arrow
Jump: Up arrow
Landing: Down arrow
Pause: P

Credits:

David Arnau Hernández: menu and dialogue design
José Daroqui Plaza: programing player movement, levels and game navigation
Alejandro Gutiérrez Rodríguez: player design and animaiton, buildings and background design

2016.
